paragraph: Call or text the contact number for a consultation

detailsData.title: Experienced Attorneys
detailsData.content: With over 70 years of collective litigation experience, our attorneys have the expertise and understanding to effectively represent you in your legal dispute.

detailsData.title: Client-Centered Approach
detailsData.content: We work closely with experts, investigators, and other attorneys to build your case and maximize the value of your claim.

detailsData.title: Fee Flexibility
detailsData.content: We offer fee agreements that allow us to pursue your rights without straining your finances, including contingency options in certain cases.

valueProp: Barry Law Group is dedicated to providing exceptional legal representation with a focus on client education and success in all legal matters.
CTA: Discuss Your Case With Our Skilled Attorneys

testimonalData.text: Steven Barry is my lawyer and the complete staff is fantastic. I've been so blessed to have met Steven, and for Steven to have taken on my case.
testimonalData.author: Robert

testimonalData.text: Jared Barry took on a probate matter that was expected to result in litigation by one of the beneficiaries. Mr. Barry has continued to defend the case and provide regular updates.
testimonalData.author: Sandra

testimonalData.text: Jared is a true professional. Although we did not have a big case, it was important to us. Jared sincerely cared and gave the case the attention that it needed.
testimonalData.author: Cindy
